chunks.title: ITSM License Overview
chunks.content:
ServiceNow ITSM is available in four license tiers: Standard, Professional, Professional Plus (Pro+), and Enterprise. Each tier builds upon the previous one, adding more features and capabilities.

Standard: Core incident, problem, change management
Professional: Standard + Service Catalog, SLA Management
Professional Plus: Professional + Performance Analytics, Virtual Agent
Enterprise: Pro+ + Predictive Intelligence, Process Optimization

chunks.title: ITSM Feature Comparison
chunks.content:
Feature Comparison Across ITSM License Tiers:

Incident Management: Standard ✓, Professional ✓, Pro+ ✓, Enterprise ✓
Problem Management: Standard ✓, Professional ✓, Pro+ ✓, Enterprise ✓
Change Management: Standard ✓, Professional ✓, Pro+ ✓, Enterprise ✓
Service Catalog: Standard ✗, Professional ✓, Pro+ ✓, Enterprise ✓
SLA Management: Standard ✗, Professional ✓, Pro+ ✓, Enterprise ✓
Virtual Agent: Standard ✗, Professional ✗, Pro+ ✓, Enterprise ✓
Performance Analytics: Standard ✗, Professional ✗, Pro+ ✓, Enterprise ✓
Predictive Intelligence: Standard ✗, Professional ✗, Pro+ ✗, Enterprise ✓
Process Optimization: Standard ✗, Professional ✗, Pro+ ✗, Enterprise ✓

chunks.title: Virtual Agent Capabilities
chunks.content:
Virtual Agent Capabilities by License Tier:

Standard: Virtual Agent not included.
Professional: Virtual Agent not included.
Professional Plus: Basic Virtual Agent capabilities including pre-built conversation flows for common IT service requests, password resets, and knowledge article searches.
Enterprise: Advanced Virtual Agent with all Pro+ features plus AI-powered topic suggestions, NLU enhancements, and conversation analytics.

chunks.title: Workplace Service Delivery
chunks.content:
Workplace Service Delivery (WSD) Features:

1. Workplace Reservation Management: Allow employees to reserve workspaces, meeting rooms, and resources.
2. Workplace Space Mapping: Interactive floor plans for spatial awareness and navigation.
3. Workplace Visitor Management: Register and track visitors and their appointments.
4. Workplace Case Management: Handle workplace-related requests and incidents.
5. Workplace Space Management: Track and manage physical spaces and assets.

WSD is available as a separate product offering and is not included in the ITSM license tiers.

chunks.title: Predictive Intelligence Overview
chunks.content:
Predictive Intelligence Overview:

Predictive Intelligence uses machine learning to automate routine tasks and provide insights for better decision-making. Key capabilities include:

1. Similar Ticket Clustering: Groups related incidents to identify patterns.
2. Anomaly Detection: Identifies unusual patterns in service metrics.
3. Assignment Recommendations: Suggests the best assignment group for incidents.
4. Major Incident Prediction: Identifies potential major incidents before they occur.
5. Sentiment Analysis: Analyzes user sentiment in interactions.

Predictive Intelligence is only included in the Enterprise license tier. It is not available in Standard, Professional, or Professional Plus.
